Key Match Events: Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty in the fourth minute of first-half stoppage time.
Patrik Schick equalized with a chest shot in the 59th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Saba Lobjanidze missed a potential winning goal for Georgia in the dying moments of the match.
Patrik Schick limped out of the game shortly after scoring the equalizer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgia took a shock lead through a penalty scored by Georges Mikautadze.
The Czechia dominated the early part of the game but failed to convert their chances.
Both teams need a win in their final group match to progress to the knockout stages.
